query:
SELECT t.configuration
                FROM attempts a
                LEFT JOIN exam_tasks et ON et.exam_id = a.exam_id
                LEFT JOIN exams e ON e.id = a.exam_id
                LEFT JOIN tasks t ON t.id = et.task_id
                WHERE
                    a.user_id = $1 AND a.ends_at > NOW() AND
                    t.task_type = 'ctfd'
